posts.post_content:
I have a couple of T206 available if anyone is interested:

1.) John McGraw (portrait- no cap) - Hindu - SGC 10 1 ... back stamp: Fredrick Benedict Gessner, Writing: "Princeton".

2.) Sam Crawford (with bat) - American Beauty 350 ... SGC 40 3 ... diamond cut

I will do $750 for the pair, and I will cover shipping for you.

Thank You Very Much.

Derek
